entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
